flavor_text_entries.black:
It can deftly dodge its foe’s attacks
while shooting fireballs from its nose.
It roasts berries before it eats them.
flavor_text_entries.white:
It blows fire through its nose.
When it catches a cold, the fire
becomes pitch-black smoke instead.
flavor_text_entries.black-2:
It loves to eat roasted berries,
but sometimes it gets too excited
and burns them to a crisp.
flavor_text_entries.white-2:
It loves to eat roasted berries,
but sometimes it gets too excited
and burns them to a crisp.
